universal_guidelines: ALWAYS use 'Bebas Neue' for headings and 'Manrope' for body text.
NEVER use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use #050505 or #0A0A0A.
Use 'text-muted-foreground' for secondary text to reduce eye strain.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state (color change or scale).
Use 'backdrop-blur-md' for overlays to maintain context.
Do not use gradients for text; keep text solid for readability.
Images must have 'object-cover' and proper aspect ratios.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react' and 'framer-motion'. 2. Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the provided colors and fonts. 3. Create the 'Bebas Neue' and 'Manrope' font imports in 'index.css'. 4. Build the 'Home' and 'Results' pages using the defined layout strategies. 5. Use the provided image URLs for backgrounds and placeholders.
